15 to the power of negative 2 end exponent space x space 15 to the power of negative 3 end exponent
equals 15 to the power of negative 2 end exponent space to the power of. left parenthesis negative 3 right parenthesis end exponent space
equals 15 to the power of negative 6 end exponent
equals 1 over 15 to the power of 6
